reviews.review:
Muy buen juego de zombies mejor que el 2.
Ya sea cooperativo o solo es perfecto para matar el rato.

Десятки, сотни, тысячи зомбей разных видов и оттенков ждут, чтобы вы пустили в них пулю! 

Великолепная мультиплеерная игра (собственно и в сингле всё пристойно) в которой вы постоянно находитесь на волосок от гибели (слава вырабатывающемуся адреналину). Геймплей и подходящий саундтрэк вообще не могут наскучить вам, играли ли вы час или 100 часов. Стоит упомянуть персонажей за которых мы играем, они колоритны и отпускают меткие реплики касательно происходящего вокруг. 

Попытайтесь выжить! 9 убежищ из 10 :)

We dont know a lot about how the outbreak started but one things for sure:  Zombies+Shotguns=Fun.  foll owing this formula you can see how a zombie surivival game got a sequal and so many modders working on mods and custom maps.  Now the left 4 dead games take it way further than just bringing the dead back to life.  they do this by adding a unique group of shall we say "super zombies" that include things such as the Hunter and Tank, the latter being possibly the most know type of zombie in the game.   this addition of super zombies or as the game calls them special infected adds a unique twist to gameplay in that if your whole team is runing with shotguns you with be weak to long range smokers but if your whole team is running sniper rifles you will be weak with up close encounters of things like Hunters.  so a variety of weaponry is required (well, not REQUIRED but reccomended) which is cool. there is also the number of game modes like vesus, survival, and stockpile.
I love Left 4 Dead just as much as Left 4 Dead 2, they are both amazing games to play.
МЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯСО!!!!
fun game i like it

If you can find a better co op zombie franchise I will personally buy you a game.
Or diddle your gumdrops. Either way.
One of the best zombie surival games ever made. Put simply.
Fantastic, can't get enough of it. Let's face it, who doesn't like slaughtering zombies....

HOLY FUKIN SHIT PILLS HERE, SHIT SHIT YES, I HATE RECOMMENDATIONS, HOLY FUCK IF YOU DO NOT OWN THIS GAME ALREADY THEN YOU ARE NOT A HAPPY PERSON FROTH FROTH FROTH

The second one is less important... 

54,000 dead zombie corpses out of 0.
venez jouer :)

De lo mejor para jugar en cooperativo. Buenos gráficos de mano del motor Source y una ambientación de cine.

Título recomendable para todos los apasionados a los FPS.

Poco mas puede decirse de este conocidisimo shooter de zombies creado por la gran Valve.

Nos encontramos ante el tipico apocalipsis zombie que ha arrasado la civilizacion, encarando a 4 supervivientes:Bill el duro veterano de guerra, Zoey la chica del grupo(no vayan a tildarnos de machistas),Francis un temerario motorista y Louis un oficinista negro (mas estereotipos).Dichos protagonistas atravesaran diversos escenarios repletos de zombies usando una gran variedad de armas donde la colaboracion entre jugadores sera fundamental en los niveles mas dificiles. 

En sumario un cooperativo online imprescindible para pasar una tarde divertida con unos colegas.
Simplemente estupendo. No he parado de jugarlo desde que lo compré.

Un bel gioco, che sfrutta a dovere il motore Source Engine. Cooperazione davvero ben strutturata, non esasperante, dunque bilanciata e divertente. Si possono passare davvero dei bei pomeriggi ma soprattutto nottate, in compagnia dei propri amici a sfracellare orde di zombie in mezzo a risate, piacevoli chiacchiere e imprecazioni. Davvero consigliato.
BEST GAME IN THE HISTORY OF ALL GAMES.

GREAT game to play with friends online in the many servers running this game. The single player campaign is fun but not what makes this game. It's getting together with 3 other gamers and playing a vidoe game version of the hit AMC series "Walking Dead." Seriously thats what it feels like. Or maybe more like "28 Days Later" or "28 Weeks Later." Either way this game will have you pissing your pants.
А все началось с гарены... Отличная игра, которая полюбому затянет вас.
A lot like Super Meat Boy but with less blood and a few more dead things that want to eat your damn face off.
PROTIP: Don't let the black guy eat all your pills.
it has zombies...
muito bom game
Zombie killin mahem goodness.

UUUURGH!!! *börps* ...*Kabumm!!*

____ Killed Boomer
mkaay

Excellent game, that requires skill and tactics to win.
Biggest downside is that the community is horrible.
Rewelacyjna gra dla miłośników serialu The Walking Dead. Można się poczuć jak jeden z jego bohaterów walcząc z hordami zombiaków.

First started playing this on the Xbox with a friend. Fell in love with it. Now playing on the MAC with friends, and its even more fun! It's amazing how this game still remains popular even after years. The custom content out there is eye-popping, and unbelievablely gigantic! 

Play, or be left 4 dead!
Awsome Game You Should Try It Out For Your Self
Uno de los mejores juegos y de mis favoritos! =D

The time to play this title has long past. If you can manage to find a lobby with different players, best of luck too you. Sad to see it bite the dust as soon as it did. Shoutouts to Valve and the premature release of the Sequel.
Что первая, что вторая - отличные игры! Кооп решает!
Sweet

The original. If you can get a good group together, has a slightly better flavour than L4D2. Not as endlessly repeatable, but it's fun to play a game where the tanks keep bashing you to death and you're routinely faced with the decision: save that guy by attracting the tank's attention from zero range (i.e. by pushing the tank), or just keep shooting while your teammate dies....

Un coop' au top, des zombies et du fun.
Prenez Left 4 Dead 2 qui contient toutes les maps de la première version.

left 4 dead is a great zombie game, in which the goal is to surivie as a team in a world full of zombies, rarley does a game base itself soly on mulitiplayer, but left 4 dead does its so well, that you don't want to even think about playing this game with the AI, overall a great game to play with your online friends, and I a great classic
Zombies + Shotgun = <3
First person shooter.  Lots of zombies and lots of weapons to kill them.   I fully enjoyed it.

Great multiplayer game, with loads of variations and replayability !    Be careful or you will spend your life killing the infected ! - It's that ADDICTIVE !!!  Games come and go , but this one is a CLASSIC!!!
fun game to relax and drink also play with your buddies , also good game  to pass the time. defintley recommended

Awesome teamplay game. Very challenging and fun when you know you can trust and work well with your teammates, especially on advance and expert difficulty. However its very frustrating when you have careless teammates who don't know how to work together.

There is currently no reason to buy L4D1.  ALL of the campaigns from this game have been ported over to Left 4 Dead 2, including the new infected and a few map tweaks.

I say again: there is NO REASON to buy Left 4 Dead any more, buy L4D2, even if L4D is on sale.
Le jeu de coop par excellence ! Terminé : toutes les campagnes
Theres no point in having L4D anymore when everything and i mean EVERYTHING in this game is in L4D2
Imprescindible!

Эталон кооперативного шутера. Играть исключительно с друзьями. Море фана. Для любителей людского противостояния также есть версус-режим. Ну и это продолжение первого "Лефтача" с расширенными возможностями соответственно :)
This game is amazing. One of my favorites.

1. Fully realized and fun co-op gameplay
2. Infinite replayability and various gameplay modes
3. Expandable with great user created content
4. Very active community of players, modders, and content creators

Zombies, guns, bad-ass old guy, and the black guy that is first to die. Need I say more? I like this version of Left 4 Dead more than L4D2, it's smoother and simpler. Multi-player is filled with assholes though.
THIS GAME ROCKS MY SOCKS
nice

The seminal co-op FPS. Satisfying gameplay, atmospheric setting and enjoyable characters. A great experience especially if you've got some friends to share the experience with.

Though this game's campaigns have been ported over to the sequel, I still personally prefer the aesthetics and feel of the original, and the simpler gameplay still makes it the best to introduce new players to.

Muito bonzinho. Não sei se posso tirar do diminutivo. É um joguinho divertido e, até onde joguei, sem muita preocupação em ter uma trama envolvente ou uma história marcante. Mas a jogabilidade é simples e boa, e o dinamismo dá uma graça a mais, especialmente pra quem curte uma matança online.
Recomendo sim.

Imagine, if you will, a warehouse full of walking corpses, bent on tearing apart your soul in the most painful way possible.  Their rotting flesh awaits new meat to satisfy the pain of their eternal hunger.

THEN HERE YOU COME, JUST PELVIC-THRUSTING EVERYTHING INTO FUCKIN' PULP, YOU BADASS.  Zombies?  Pfft, GTFO my way - I've got pills to find!
Si te matar zombis a cholon este es tu juego

Left 4 Dead is the best zombie apocalypse style game ever developed. It's not really for the storyline, but don't get me wrong, the storyline is great. There's just not much of it. So if you want a game that will be a legend and you already have Skyrim and any Assassin's Creed game, or you want to shoot zombies with your friends... Screw that **** JUST BUY THIS GAME! It also has some Garry's Mod props. So yeah. This is an amazing game.

Creo que es el juego al que más horas he jugado los últimos tres años, aunque en 360 (que para el caso es lo mismo). Terminar todas las campañas en experto es toda una experiencia si se hace con amigos. Si estás dudando, cómpralo.
best game ever
The Zombie Apocalypse is upon us. Come out and help clear the hordes. However, whatever you do, don't annoy the witch.
Tout simplement Genial ;)
I enjoy a challenge so I really just play Expert and Versus. This game makes you think on your feet a lot everytime zombies attack you. Specially on Versus. God such a masterpiece
Legjobb zombi hentelés!
its. awesome.

Do you like killing zombies? Then you should buy this game. Left 4 dead is a really exceptionable game. This is a true pc game. The control setup feels like it was made for the pc. I've never played a pc game that felt this natural on a keyboard before. This game has really nice replay value. With a coop campaign, versus, survival, and a single player, you should never get bored of this game. There's tons of ways to play this game, not just the different game mechanics, but there are 6 maps for each one. Including the 4 difficulties you will never tire of this game. Another great thing about this game is, since it heavily demands you play with other people, teamwork can be really amazing. That said, you can always get people who don't know how to play, or don't know how to work as a team. Also this game has alot of girefers, and they pop up alot on expert games. If you're playing on expert, you should start with 4 people, or it's guarenteed they'll find you at some point.
Left 4 Dead, an amazing FPS Zombie game. it may be really hard on normal, but fun none the less, I recommend eveyone to buy this game is they have the money.
If you dont own this, buy it. Its one of my favorite games. Better than the first, imo. It feels much more simple and less clustered. Buy it now!
De bonnes campagne, très bon jeu co-op entre potes ; Bon jeu pour le côté e-sport aussi avec le mode versus. Un bon jeu qui tient ses promesses.

Bellissimo gioco!!! Incentrato tutto sul lavoro di squadra!

Non te lo godi a pieno se non si hanno dei validi amici con cui giocare!
its damn fun
Super fun! Absolutely love the survival aspect and the insane amount of zombies!
Good Game!
It's a fun game with zombies. Thanks Gabe.
If you like killing zombies, you will love this game:D
Bon défouloir
Better than L4D2 in my opinion.
Buenos vicios te puedes pegar con este juego. Te lias a matar zombies y sin darte cuenta te has quedado pegado al asiento.

Like an old friend, this is a game you'll want to revisit again and again. Utterly compellling, flawless gameplay and an absolute blast whether you casually spend an hour in single-player mode, or write off a whole evening playing multiplayer on one of the servers.
Buy it. Embrace it. Simply essential.
неплохой сюжет, хорошая и приятная на глаз графика, харизматичные и проработанные персонажы, прекрасная динамика и жуткая атмосфера (зернистость плёнки в тёмных местах кстати) вообщем 9.5 из 10 =)
Muy divertido para jugar con amigos, y en modo versus :D
lol
Excellent ambience and very addictive co-op game!
I have been playing this game for a year and I still love it. It has made me so much more antisocial. Hurrah!
LE jeu de coopération par excellence !
Me encanto el juego, muchos disparos, gigantes hordas y coop de 4 jugadores.
Awesome co-op game with zombies
Besser als Left 4 Dead 2 !

Malgré sa date de sortie (novembre 2008), ce jeux garde sont authenticité et son gameplay unique. Ses graphisme déjà bien avancé pour son âge.
Un jeux intemporel! Qui pour ma part, j'ai joué pas mal de fois seul ou avec des amis, serieusement ou en délirant.
Un Jeu conseille pour ses modes de jeux et même pour Valve dont-ils font preuves d'originalités dans leurs jeux!

Some may like L4D2 better, but to me it is like comparing the original "Dawn of the Dead" to the original "Night of the Living Dead". Dawn may be good and more colorful, it also came after and built onto the first. However, L4D and Night have the darker, been-there-first edge to it. L4D is more of a horror game to me than L4D2.

Plus, since we highly modify our servers, we like having 6 hunters spawning at a time to really keep the survivors working together and staying on their toes at the sound of hunters spawning. It's knuckle-up or you're gonna die quicker than on the stock servers.

'At least L4D1 doesn't have a turd on its suit.'
i love this game its beautiful

Seriously? You haven't gotten this game yet? You must live a boring life if you haven't bought this game yet. Buy it now, get some friends and let the game do it's magic to entertain you.

Don't get the second one though.
I've wasted literally years of my life on this game. You should too.

The original will always hold a place dear to my heart; however, now Valve has released all the original campaigns (with the original characters) to Left 4 Dead 2, there's really not much of a reason to get this one anymore...perhaps if your computer is older and can't handle the newer game, that might be one valid reason.

Also, there are some achivevements available only in this game, in case you care about that. Otherwise, now that these are the same price, (and especially with the Summer Sale going on) I would look to buy Left 4 Dead 2 (and read my review about it, if you're curious) if you want some zombie-killing action.

Still deserves a 10/10 for giving us what we have today.
Mindless, fun, thrilling game to play. Nothing relieves the stress from a long hard day like shooting some zombies.

This game is really cool, you can play multiplayer and fight against the horde or play on your own with 3 other bots, although i havent finished it i think you guys should get it. 
8/10
As broken as it is, I still love it
The Classic
Best game ever
This game will always be the best zombie game created.
Si ten gustan los zombies, definitivamente debes comprar este juego.
